thread.section_title: Haymarket Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding
thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of Haymarket Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rmich
title: Outstanding
text: I recently stayed with my young daughters for a 4 day London break and cannot compliment the staff and hotel enough. From the moment of arrival we were warmly welcomed with some extra touches for the girls. The luxury junior suite was well appointed, extremely comfortable and exceptionally clean. The location is perfect for theatre, shopping, restaurants and museums and the front desk team very helpful in recommending ideas for the best way to spend our time. Overall a wonderful stay.
